hpp-skeleton.ReplacementPlaceHolder.description: The string your editor will find and select at the end of the skeleton computation.

hpp-skeleton.publicMethods.description: Custom public methods to add to the skeleton. Use $CLASSNAME as a reference to the class and $PLACEHOLDER as a reference to the selection.

hpp-skeleton.privateMethods.title: private Methods
hpp-skeleton.privateMethods.description: Custom private methods to add to the skeleton. Use $CLASSNAME as a reference to the class and $PLACEHOLDER as a reference to the selection.

hpp-skeleton.functions.title: Out of class function definitions
hpp-skeleton.functions.description: Custom functions to add to the skeleton. Use $CLASSNAME as a reference to the class and $PLACEHOLDER as a reference to the selection.

hpp-skeleton.includes.title: Includes
hpp-skeleton.includes.description: Includes to add to the skeleton. ("example.hpp", <example2>)

hpp-skeleton.headerCommandId.title: Header command ID
hpp-skeleton.headerCommandId.description: The id of the command to execute at the creation of the skeleton (example: 42header.insertHeader). CAREFUL: this will actually EXECUTE the command and unknown commands will result in no skeleton creations!

hpp-skeleton.headerCommandShouldExecute.description: Controls wether or not the skeleton executes the 'headerCommandId' at the start of the skeleton creation.
